title: [水][辐射Fallout]求教辐射mac版在哪里下（除了steam）
author: green-creeper
txt_content: 详情见主题.学校限制电脑，不能安装steam。。。

replies.author: green-creeper
replies.txt_content: 233玩了手机版以后真心想玩电脑版

replies.author: green-creeper
replies.txt_content: 电脑版的画质看起来非常牛逼

replies.author: zeng001223
replies.txt_content: 为什么要在学校装steam........守望么
